content.text: Trial 1/5, Stage 'corner2': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The image shows a groove with a primary direction along the X-axis (right to left in the image) and a secondary direction along the Y-axis (downward in the image). The red circle indicates the gaze point in the bottom-left corner.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [250, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
